----------------------------------------------------------

[b]EXTRA iNFO[/b]

This is our first ever Sushi-Subs release. The reason why we did fansubs was to "spread our wings" a bit on some of the stuff that we have been doing, and also because it was one of our ideas when starting SushiKushi. We are not a big fan of the yellow and bland subtitles given by the official studios, so we decided to make our own. We felt like to start off our fansubbing project with something that is intriguing and interesting, so why not Shimoneta. So far, the staff likes the show and we will be working on it until it is completed. Thanks to Sachi and Senketsu for TL and also tweaking some subs. Also thanks to Tenchou for Typesetting the signs in Shimoneta! Be sure to leave a comment and like! Expect more Sushi-Sub releases of Shimoneta in the forecoming days! :)

[/center]
